category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_CLONE_CREATE_BASED_ON
preference.preference_description: Defines how the "Based On" relation is created when cloning structures in the Manufacturing Process Planner (MPP) application. If the value is true, the "Based On" relation between the clone and original objects will be created for objects in all levels. Otherwise the relation will be only created to the top level object. The default value is false.
